job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van backend software met C# .NET.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of building backend software using a specific programming language and framework.

job_tasks.phrase: Vertalen van user stories en requirements naar concrete oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of taking high-level requirements and turning them into functional software code, a key aspect of software development.
This highlights the engineering principles of creating software that can grow and adapt over time, which is fundamental to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken met nieuwe technologieën zoals AI (LLM)
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the use and application of Large Language Models (LLM), which falls under the 'Modeling' category as it involves working with advanced AI models.
The mention of Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) directly relates to the operational aspects of software delivery and maintenance, fitting into Operations Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: draag je bij aan innovatieve oplossingen en help je zorgprofessionals het verschil te maken.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase connects the technical work to the business objective of supporting healthcare professionals and making a difference in the healthcare sector.

soft_skills.phrase: test het samen met je teamleden
Heb je hier nog geen ervaring mee? Geen probleem, dit leer je bij ons!

classification.rationale: The role focuses heavily on backend software development with C# .NET, Agile methodologies, and CI/CD practices. While AI (LLM) and Azure are mentioned, the primary emphasis is on building and deploying software, not on advanced model research, fine-tuning, or deep generative AI application development as defined for a GenAI Engineer.
